item.title: Getting started with win-universal-app
item.description: Installation or Setup # We have 2 way, we can install Universal app in windows 10 devices (OS/Phone). One app works for both mobile and OS 1 Install using Power Shell command Step 1: Make sure app not have any error and developed, then right click on Universal app project in solution explorer. Step 2: Select Store and Choose Create App Package option Step 3: Select No and click Next, here choose architecture x86 and x64 bit or choose as per your requirement.
